bitfield.description: UUPS Interrupt Vector Value.

bitenum.description: No Interrupt pending
Interrupt Source: PTMOUT; Interrupt Priority: Highest
Interrupt Source: PREQIG
Interrupt Source: STPBYDB
Reserved; Interrupt Priority: Lowest

bitfield.description: UUPS Power Up Time Out Masked Interrupt Status bit.

bitenum.description: No interrupt pending
Interrupt pending

bitfield.description: UUPS Power Request Ignore Masked Interrupt Status bit.

bitenum.description: No interrupt pending
Interrupt pending

bitfield.description: USS has been interrupted by debug mode Masked Interrupt Status bit.

bitenum.description: No interrupt pending
Interrupt pending

bitfield.description: UUPS Power Up Timer Out Raw Interrupt Status bit.

bitenum.description: Time out during power up has not occurred
Time out during power up has occurred

bitfield.description: UUPS Power Request Ignore Masked Interrupt Status and Clear bit.

bitenum.description: No USS_PWRREQ signal has been ignored
USS_PWRREQ signal has been ignored

bitfield.description: USS has been interrupted by debug mode.

bitenum.description: USS has not been interrupted by debug halt mode.
USS has been interrupted by debug halt mode.

bitfield.description: UUPS Power Up Time Out Interrupt Mask bit.

bitenum.description: UUPS Power Up Time Out Interrupt is disabled.
UUPS Power Up Time Out Interrupt is enabled.

bitfield.description: Power Request Ignore Interrupt Mask bit.

bitenum.description: Power Request Ignore Interrupt is disabled.
Power Request Ignore Interrupt is enabled.

bitfield.description: USS has been interrupted by debug mode Interrupt Mask bit.

bitenum.description: STPBYDB Interrupt is disabled
STPBYDB Interrupt is enabled

bitfield.description: Power Request Ignored Interrupt Clear bit.
UUPS Power Up Time Out Interrupt Clear bit.
USS has been interrupted by debug mode Interrupt Clear bit.
Power Request Ignored Interrupt Set bit.
UUPS Power Up Time Out Interrupt Set bit.
USS has been interrupted by debug mode Interrupt Set bit.
Minor Revision
Instance Number within the device.
Major Revision
Feature Set for the module
Turn on USS Power and PLL

bitenum.description: No action
Power up the USS module and generate the PSQ_START to the ASQ if CTL.ASQEN = 1. Note: This bit becomes invalid in debug mode.

bitfield.description: Power Ready Output Event Select

bitenum.description: Do not generate the PSQ_START signal event to ASQ.
Generate the PSQ_START signal event to the ASQ.

bitfield.description: USS LDO is ready

bitenum.description: USS LDO is powered down or in transition mode
USS LDO is powered on
no additional delay
additional hold off delay of ~100us (512 REFCLKs)
additional hold off delay of ~200us (1024 REFCLKs)
additional hold off delay of ~300us (1536 REFCLKs)

bitfield.description: USS Power Down

bitenum.description: No action
Stop the current measurement and power off the USS module.

bitfield.description: USS Power Up trigger source select.

bitenum.description: CTL.USSPWRUP bit
Ext. trigger (see the device specific datasheet)
Ext. trigger (see the device-specific data sheet)
Ext. trigger (see the device-specific data sheet)

bitfield.description: USS Measurement Stop

bitenum.description: No action
Stop the current measurement.

bitfield.description: USS Power Up trigger source select.

bitenum.description: USS is in OFF mode
USS is in STANDBY mode
USS power mode is in transition.
USS is in READY mode

bitfield.description: USS Busy bit.

bitenum.description: The USS module is not busy.
The USS module is busy.

bitfield.description: Software reset

bitenum.description: Disabled. USS (and sub modules) reset released for operation
Enabled. USS (and sub modules) logic held in reset state
